summary: This mod adds a little bit more flora to Rorikstead.  The people of Rorikstead prayed to Kynareth for more fertile land and with it more trees. This mod also adds 2 more houses, both of which are burnt down but one has a dark secret to do with the prays to kynareth (a small human sacrifice shrine along with the murder weapon).
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a little bit more flora to Rorikstead.Â  The people of Rorikstead prayed to Kynareth for more fertile land and with it more trees. This mod also adds 2 more houses, both of which are burnt down but one has a dark secret to do with the prays to kynareth (a small human sacrifice shrine along with the murder weapon).

You may experience some frame drop on lower end PC's eg duel core, 2gb ram, intergrated graphics/bad graphics card.

INSTALL
Install it just like any other mod.
UNINSTALL
Uninstall it just like any other mod.
COMPATABILITY
This should only be incompatible with other mods that change Rorikstead. If there better than this, then by all means use them, no really, I don't mind.
REQUIREMENTS
The base game and of course, the mod.

The other mods used in the screenshots are Skysoft ENB and Skyrim HD texture pack.

This is the final and only version of the mod. Will only get updated if there are major bugs.

Enjoy.

Checkout my first mod, Whiterun Bridge Den [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26409/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26409/[/url]. Its a small house under the bridge as you go into Whiterun.
author: BarronTV1
